item.title: Movies
item.description: Watch list Mirror (1975) 3:10 to Yuma Recently Watched (my rating /10) Gladiator 2 (6) Braveheart (7) Saltburn (3) Wind River (8.5) Hell or High Water (8) Blue Ruin (8) The Place Beyond the Pines () Personal Favorites (unranked) Stalker (1979) Parasite Mother (dir. Bong Joon ho) Memories of murder Dune 1 and 2 Snowpiercer Gravity Arrival Incendis Prisoners ….. I’ll add some when I remember, by now I’ve almost forgotten half of the movies I’ve watched over the past years.
